channel.title: Entertainment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Entertainment on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:120 Chances: Disney’s main mission is to capture broad and increasingly diverse audiences, and the theme parks division is the best-performing business. Walt Disney (DIS) closed at $117.97, marking a +0.53% move from the previous day. Disney’s Marvel and Coca-Cola collaborate for an extraordinary global campaign to showcase popular Marvel characters.

item.title: EDR
item.description: score:158 Chances: Endeavor Group Holdings Inc. has shown growth potential through its innovative rights deals and exclusive live events in the Owned Sports Properties segment. The company’s Events, Experiences & Rights segment owns and operates several successful events, including the Miami Open and New York Fashion Week.
